about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A creative and innovative startup project by class HA25B
about.descriptionP1: Our student enterprise is a creative and innovative startup project by students of class HA25B at the one-year vocational school for business with a focus on trade and IT at the vocational schools BBS I Lüneburg. We specialize in 3D printing and turn our ideas into reality with great motivation and team spirit.
about.descriptionP2: Through a design thinking process, we conducted interviews with potential customers to find out which products are in demand – and now we develop and produce them. We also work in cooperation with the vocational school BBS II: We market their woodworking products as aspiring trade professionals.

points.title: Design Thinking
points.description: Customer-oriented product development through systematic market research

points.title: Trade Skills
points.description: Marketing products as aspiring trade professionals

points.title: Teamwork
points.description: Open team with strong, supportive collaboration

about.missionP1: As a student enterprise, we rely on teamwork, creativity, and mutual support. Every idea counts, every contribution is valuable. We are an open team that is constantly evolving and creating innovative solutions for exciting projects.
about.missionP2: To provide real added value for the community with our products – while gaining experience for our professional future.
about.missionP3: Our student enterprise stands for creativity, motivation, and strong, supportive collaboration – and we look forward to realizing many more exciting projects!

items.title: Wirtschaft-Live Trade Fair
items.description: Statewide trade fair of student enterprises from all over Lower Saxony with about 20 participating teams. Competitions: best exhibition stand, best trade fair contribution, best image film, and best photo presentation of the business idea.

items.title: Summer Sale
items.description: Sale of remaining products at reduced prices as well as specially manufactured summer items such as insect protection for drinks and other seasonal 3D-printed products.

events.messeText: The trade fair offers young people the opportunity to present their business ideas and products to a broad audience. The goal is to practically promote entrepreneurial thinking and action, strengthen economic competencies, and support exchange between students, schools, business, and politics.
events.summerText: At the Summer Sale, we not only offer remaining products at reduced prices, but also specially developed summer items. A highlight is our 3D-printed insect protection solutions for drinks.
